title: 31. Should You Trust Angelina Jolie or Your Doctor?
description: Celebrities influence the clothes we wear and the books we read. Do they also affect our health decisions? Bapu Jena looks at what happens when people take medical advice from movie stars.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Celebrities influence the clothes we wear and the books we read. Do they also affect our health decisions? Bapu Jena looks at what happens when people take medical advice from movie stars.
